EcmaScript6 Examples - properties

To work with encapsulation EcmaScript 6 brings properties to access the attributes of a class. Get and Set are pretty famous and useful in languages as Java and C#, and now is possible to use in EcmaScript.

Let's see an example: 

                
                    class MachineES6{
                        constructor(name){
                            this._name = name;
                        }

                        get name(){
                            return this._name;
                        }

                        set name(value){
                            this._name = value;
                        }
                    }

                    let machineES6 = new MachineES6('Computer');

                    machineES6.name; //=> Computer

                    machineES6.name = "Laptop";
                    machineES6.name; //=> Laptop

Unfortunately EcmaScript doesn't have one way to work with private attributes, and to do that in nowadays exist a convention where private attributes to start with underscore. Private attributes are a promise to EcmaScript 7, but right now is possible to work with properties using Get and Set.
